Class P1_Wang_Jake_DrawUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • P1_Wang_Jake_DrawUnit

  • public class P1_Wang_Jake_DrawUnit
extends java.lang.Object
    Draws a single apartment unit exterior

    • Constructor Summary

      P1_Wang_Jake_DrawUnit(int Cx, int Cy, gpdraw.SketchPad pad, double ACRate)
      Draws a singular apartment unit exterior

    • Constructor Detail

      • P1_Wang_Jake_DrawUnit

        public P1_Wang_Jake_DrawUnit(int Cx,
                             int Cy,
                             gpdraw.SketchPad pad,
                             double ACRate)
        Draws a singular apartment unit exterior
        Parameters:
        Cx - x value of the center of block, width is 200 px.
        Cy - y value of the center of block, height is 150 px.
        pad - the SketchPad object to draw on (imported from gpdraw library).
        ACRate - the probability that an air conditioning unit will be drawn on each apartment unit.

    • Method Detail

      • SetSnowing

        public void SetSnowing(boolean snowing)
        decides snow status to decide version to draw. must be ran before drawing
        Parameters:
        snowing - true - draw snowy version of apartments, false - draw without snow

      • Draw

        public void Draw()
        self-explanatory
